title: Is there a more detailed self-help book than Dale Carnegie's 'How to Win Friends and Influence People' on interpersonal communication? - Quora
tags: How to Win Friends and Influence People (1936 book)

response.answer_text: I am writing a book, posted freely here on Quora. I have not added the relationship chapter to the post yet, but if you stay tuned or send me your email, I will make sure to you inform you when it is ready. It will go very indepth. More than you can imagine. Effective Meditation: A Self-Realization Empowerment Guide
